title: Bug 20556ImageAnalyzer example  bug in the set background
description: build 200206171  Run the ImageAnalyzer found on org.eclipse.swt.examples.2  In the Background Combo choice a different Color3  the canvas on center will not changed its background color, only thescrollbar will.The bug is on examples, though this is working properly on Windows.A possible fix is remove imageCanvas.fillRectangle(...) call from thechangeBackground() method.Maybe we should fix this to F4..
